mapper.insert: insert into com_user_subscription (id, create_time, modify_time, user_id, com_sku_material_library, status, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{comSkuMaterialLibrary,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update com_user_subscription set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, com_sku_material_library = #{comSkuMaterialLibrary,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, modify_time, user_id, com_sku_material_library, status, remark from com_user_subscription
